resources.string: Search tags using the images taken and send results found to the server. Previous calibration advisable.
Calibrate the boundaries of R, G and B, in order, to detect this colors in the image. Used a template tag to calibrate. This template must be alone (without any other tag)
Allow to change the caracteristics (pattern,size, ect.) of the tags that we are looking for.
Information about app (developer, briefly description, version, etc.)
